semantic_title: Pain Disorders Related to Psychological Factors Coding
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 5. Chapter 5: Mental, Behavioral and Neurodevelopmental disorders > a. Pain disorders related to psychological factors

content.full_text: Assign code F45.41, for pain that is exclusively related to psychological disorders. As indicated by the Excludes 1 note under category G89, a code from category G89 should not be assigned with code F45.41. Code F45.42, Pain disorders with related psychological factors, should be used with a code from category G89, Pain, not elsewhere classified, if there is documentation of a psychological component for a patient with acute or chronic pain. See Section I.C.6. Pain (Evidence: pg no: 43, L30-L32)
content.summary: Provides guidance on coding pain disorders with psychological components, distinguishing between exclusively psychological pain and pain with psychological factors (Evidence: pg no: 43, L30-L32)
key_concepts: Exclusively psychological pain (Evidence: pg no: 43, L30-L31)
Pain with psychological factors (Evidence: pg no: 43, L32)
Excludes 1 note implications (Evidence: pg no: 43, L31)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use F45.41 for pain exclusively related to psychological disorders (Evidence: pg no: 43, L30-L31)
detailed_rules.explanation: When pain has no physical basis and is entirely psychological in origin, use only F45.41 (Evidence: pg no: 43, L30-L31)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Do not assign G89 codes with F45.41 (Evidence: pg no: 43, L31)
detailed_rules.explanation: The Excludes 1 note under G89 prohibits using G89 codes with F45.41 (Evidence: pg no: 43, L31)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use F45.42 with G89 codes for pain with psychological factors (Evidence: pg no: 43, L32)
detailed_rules.explanation: When pain has both physical and psychological components, use both F45.42 and appropriate G89 code (Evidence: pg no: 43, L32)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Determine if pain is exclusively psychological
Step 2: If exclusively psychological, assign F45.41 only
Step 3: If pain has psychological factors but physical basis, assign F45.42
Step 4: Add appropriate G89 code for physical pain component
Step 5: Reference Section I.C.6 for additional pain coding guidance
